title.narrative: PROGRES : Programme de Renforcement de la RESilience des populations pauvres et très pauvres et amélioration de la sécurité alimentaire et nutritionnelle dans la province de la Gnagna

description.narrative: Objectif Général: Contribuer à la lutte contre les causes de l'insécurité alimentaire et nutritionnelle par le renforcement des moyens d'existence et de relèvement des ménages pauvres et très pauvres éprouvés par la crise de 2012 pour une plus grande résilience institutionnelle, communautaire et individuelle (contribution aux OMD 1, 3, 4 et 7); Améliorer les conditions d'existence et la dignité des populations du nord de la Province de la Gnagna. Objectif Spécifique: Améliorer durablement

participating-org.narrative: European Commission - Directorate-General for International Partnerships (INTPA)
European Commission - Directorate-General for International Partnerships (INTPA)

organisation.narrative: Delegation of the European Union to Burkina Faso

department.narrative: Delegation of the European Union to Burkina Faso

description.narrative: Burkina Faso, Région de lEst, Province de la Gnagna, Communes de Coalla, Liptougou, Manni, Bogandé et Thion

description.narrative: Reported results indicators by the European Commission ¿ International Cooperation and Development (DEVCO) may not represent the complete set of indicators monitored for the project. The results are reported using a contribution approach. This means that where a project has been financed by the EU jointly with other funders ¿ such as partner country governments or other donors ¿ the overall outputs of the collective effort are reported rather than outputs attributed to the share of funding provided by the EU. For higher levels of results, such as outcomes and impacts, the project will only have contributed to the overall effort.
